title: using-ChocoRatingPackage
text: vignette demonstrates use ChocoRatingPackage explore chocolate ratings data visualize using Shiny app.

title: using-ChocoRatingPackage
text: installing loading package, can access chocolate_rating dataset, contains cleaned chocolate rating data:
code: library(ChocoRatingPackage)  # Load the dataset data(chocolate_rating)  # View the first few rows of the dataset head(chocolate_rating) #>    ref company_manufacturer company_location review_date country_of_bean_origin #> 1 2454                 5150           U.S.A.        2019               Tanzania #> 2 2458                 5150           U.S.A.        2019     Dominican Republic #> 3 2454                 5150           U.S.A.        2019             Madagascar #> 4 2542                 5150           U.S.A.        2021                   Fiji #> 5 2546                 5150           U.S.A.        2021              Venezuela #> 6 2546                 5150           U.S.A.        2021                 Uganda #>   specific_bean_origin_or_bar_name cocoa_percent ingredients #> 1            Kokoa Kamili, batch 1            76    3- B,S,C #> 2                  Zorzal, batch 1            76    3- B,S,C #> 3           Bejofo Estate, batch 1            76    3- B,S,C #> 4            Matasawalevu, batch 1            68    3- B,S,C #> 5            Sur del Lago, batch 1            72    3- B,S,C #> 6         Semuliki Forest, batch 1            80    3- B,S,C #>      most_memorable_characteristics rating #> 1         rich cocoa, fatty, bready   3.25 #> 2            cocoa, vegetal, savory   3.50 #> 3      cocoa, blackberry, full body   3.75 #> 4               chewy, off, rubbery   3.00 #> 5 fatty, earthy, moss, nutty,chalky   3.00 #> 6 mildly bitter, basic cocoa, fatty   3.25

title: using-ChocoRatingPackage
text: explore_ratings() function launches interactive Shiny app visualize chocolate ratings company country origin. Users can specify country set minimum number ratings companies included analysis. example output generated explore_ratings() function viewing ratings companies Australia:

what: ChocoRatingPackage: Tools for Exploring Chocolate Ratings with Shiny App — ChocoRatingPackage
title: ChocoRatingPackage: Tools for Exploring Chocolate Ratings with Shiny App — ChocoRatingPackage
text: ChocoRatingPackage provides chocolate ratings dataset interactive Shiny app explore chocolate ratings company country origin. Users can filter visualize chocolate ratings data, gaining insights chocolate quality across different manufacturers regions.

title: ChocoRatingPackage: Tools for Exploring Chocolate Ratings with Shiny App — ChocoRatingPackage
text: chocolate_rating: dataset containing chocolate ratings information.

title: ChocoRatingPackage: Tools for Exploring Chocolate Ratings with Shiny App — ChocoRatingPackage
text: explore_ratings(): Launches Shiny app exploring chocolate ratings.

title: ChocoRatingPackage: Tools for Exploring Chocolate Ratings with Shiny App — ChocoRatingPackage
Chocolate Ratings Dataset — chocolate_rating
text: dataset contains information chocolate ratings various manufacturers.

title: Chocolate Ratings Dataset — chocolate_rating
text: data frame 2530 rows 10 columns: ref Reference ID. highest REF numbers last entries made. company_manufacturer Name company manufacturer (manufacturer inside parentheses) company_location location company based review_date year bar reviewed country_of_bean_origin Country cocoa beans originated specific_bean_origin_or_bar_name Specific bean bar name cocoa_percent Cocoa percent (% chocolate) ingredients Ingredients (e.g., B = Beans, S = Sugar, S* = Sweetener white cane beet sugar, C = Cocoa Butter, V = Vanilla, L = Lecithin, Sa = Salt) most_memorable_characteristics summary review memorable characteristics bar rating Rating 1–5

what: Launch the Chocolate Rating Shiny App — explore_ratings
title: Launch the Chocolate Rating Shiny App — explore_ratings
text: explore_ratings() function launches interactive Shiny application allows users explore chocolate ratings company country origin. app displays boxplot chocolate ratings based user-selected country, additional controls filter companies minimum number ratings. provides intuitive interface discovering statistics rating chocolate quality across different manufacturers countries.

title: Launch the Chocolate Rating Shiny App — explore_ratings
Launch the Chocolate Rating Shiny App — explore_ratings
text: function return value. launches Shiny application opens new window browser tab.

title: Launch the Chocolate Rating Shiny App — explore_ratings
text: Shiny app features: input field specifying country origin. slider adjust minimum number ratings required company displayed. Interactive hover-tooltips boxplot show detailed rating information company.
